_sText:
dm_destruction

Destruction is a remake of the map by the same name in Return to Castle Wolfenstein. The map features 32 spawn points, and a working radar file. You can play the map on the ** WOLFENSTEIN CONQUEST ** server at 205.234.203.82:27015

_b2 features some bug fixes and more optimisation as well as some background weapon sounds.

To install, place the .bsp in your cstrike/maps folder
